title: FairGFL: Privacy-Preserving Fairness-Aware Federated Learning with Overlapping Subgraphs
summary: Graph federated learning enables the collaborative extraction of high-order information from distributed subgraphs while preserving the privacy of raw data. However, graph data often exhibits overlap among different clients. Previous research has demonstrated certain benefits of overlapping data in mitigating data heterogeneity.
